Posts.Content: May 13, 2009 06:14AM tango1 wrote: Hi sierra, i myself am only 27 and understand the worry your going through, i've had a lump for some time now, had biopsy done on it a while ago which was clear but lately the lump has grown and im getting pain in my breast and shoulder, yesterday i made an appointment to see the doc today but by yesterday afternoon i had myself that worked up with worry i rang them back and they saw me then. when she examined me she thought it would be a good idea to refer me to the breast clinic again for more investigation so now im just waiting for my appointment which she said would be within 2 weeks (its good that they are seeing me so quickly but on the other hand im thinking "is it routine to be seen so quick or did she think it was urgent to be seen quick"??? i dont think i got in that quick the last time), people are telling me not to worry but i think when your in this situation its only natural to worry. Anyway, the biopsy that i had done a while ago was not that bad, i think the waiting is the worst part. I agree with amy92407 that its a good idea to have someone with you just for support. I hope everything goes ok for you.
